--- title: Installation description: Get started with Nuxt Content by creating a new project or adding it to an existing Nuxt application. tdk: xxxxxxxx --- Full amount of content beyond the more divider. ::callout This is a `callout`{code:callout} with full **markdown** support. It can be used to link to [another page](/). :: ::callout{icon="i-heroicons-light-bulb"} This suggests a helpful tip. :: ::callout{icon="i-heroicons-exclamation-triangle" color="amber"} This raises a warning to watch out for. :: ::callout{icon="i-heroicons-light-bulb" to="https://nuxt.com" target="\_blank"} Check out this documentation. :: ::card --- title: Components icon: i-heroicons-cube to: https://nuxt.com/docs/api/components/client-only target: _blank --- Explore Nuxt built-in components for pages, layouts, head, and more. ::
::card{title="Components" icon="i-heroicons-cube-transparent"} Discover all the components available in **Nuxt UI Pro**. :: ::code-group ```bash [pnpm] pnpm add @nuxt/ui ``` ```bash [yarn] yarn add @nuxt/ui ``` ```bash [npm] npm install @nuxt/ui ``` ::
